title: Silver Rally Peaking? Watch Bond Yields For Clues
text:
Silver Futures

The rally in prices has been fast and furious, producing a steep up-trend in the iShares Silver ETF (NYSE: ) and Silver Futures charts.

A similar rally can be seen in Treasury bond yields, specifically the Treasury Bond Yield

In fact, Treasury bond yields and silver futures peaked together back in 2016 and bottomed together in 2018. Looking at the chart, could Silver and Yields be peaking again at the same time?

Note that both silver and the 10-year bond yield are nearing the same levels they both peaked at in 2016. Keep a close eye on this combo, as a key reversal point could be in play for each.
description: Commodities Analysis by Chris Kimble covering: XAG/USD, Silver Futures, iShares Silver, United States 10-Year. Read Chris Kimble's latest article on Investing.com
